note.p: British merchant in Buenos Aires. After his return to England, he lived in Hackbridge and later at Wallington Lodge near Carshalton, Surrey.
Correspondence vol. 20, letter from Alfred Tylor, 8 June 1872
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 June 2015)
West Yorkshire, England, Church of England baptisms, marriages and burials, 1512–1812 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 August 2017)
